title: Pharmacy
cleaned_text: Get your COVID-19 vaccine at Rite Aid. Schedule online or walk in for a free* COVID-19 vaccine. Tests are self-administered at home or supervised at the pharmacy and submitted to a Quest lab for processing. Did you know that we offer Pickup and Delivery services for your prescriptions? We offer larger label informationa an RFID chip containing recorded prescription information, and braille label strips. Speak to a pharmacist to learn more. Get instant answers about your health right in-store. Higi kiosks are conveniently located within most Rite Aids, for easy access to vital sign readings, including blood pressure, height, and weight. Your Rite Aid pharmacist can add fun flavor to your child's medication.
